message.body: Hey love, If you can swing it the second weekend of the show might be better than the first. Scott's family is in town and his bro is sleeping in the extra space etc etc so yea, let me know though! Carolyn may be here too!
2nd weekend is best for us!! Fern is moving on sept 1 so it will give him some time to settle. Yeah!!! Soooo excited!!!
Is it cool if we come Saturday morning and leave Sunday evening?
